frame.name: Light_movement
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Emitter</fen> emits a <fen>Beam</fen> of light from a <fen>Source</fen>, along a <fen>Path</fen>, and/or towards a <fen>Goal</fen>. Essentially, this frame denotes the (semi-)fictive motion of the the <fen>Beam</fen>. <ex>Avoid allowing <fex name="Beam">light</fex> to <t>shine</t> <fex name="Goal">into neighbors' gardens</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Beam">Clear yellow sunlight</fex> <t>shone</t> <fex name="Path">through the window-panes</fex>.</ex> <ex>She thinks <fex name="Emit">the sun</fex> <t>shines</t> <fex name="Src">out of his backside</fex>.</ex> <ex>...when <fex name="Emit">the candles</fex> <t>shine</t> <fex name="Src">out</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Beam">It</fex> <t>shines</t> <fex name="Goal">in my eyes</fex>. ('It' is both Beam and Emitter, though only one will show up in the display.) </ex> <ex>...<fex name="Beam">light</fex> <t>shines</t> <fex name="Path">down</fex> <fex name="Goal">on the world</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Beam">The moonlight</fex> <t>shone</t> <fex name="Path">off the fields</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Beam">The candlelight</fex> <t>glinted</t> <fex name="Src">from pearls and rubies</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>Degree to which the light movement occurs</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>Depictive phrase describing the external argument. <ex>Their swords <t>glowed</t> <fex name="Depictive">red</fex> in the setting sun.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Emitter
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the entity at the <fen>Source</fen> from which the <fen>Beam</fen> originates.</def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Source</fen> is the location the <fen>Beam</fen> occupies initially before its change of location.</def-root>

FE.name: Beam
FE.definition: <def-root>The light that travels from a <fen>Source</fen> along a <fen>Path</fen> to a <fen>Goal</fen>. <ex><fex name="Beam">Sunlight</fex> <t>gleamed</t> from the water of the bay.</ex> <ex><fex name="Beam">Lamplight</fex> <t>flickered</t> through the foggy air.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Path
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Path</fen> refers to where the <fen>Beam</fen> travels over or to a landmark the <fen>Beam</fen> travels by.</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Goal</fen> is the location the <fen>Beam</fen> ends up in.</def-root>
